description: He is a highly experienced cardiologist with over two decades of experience in the field of cardiac interventions and electrophysiology. He has been focusing on more complex angioplasties, whether multivessel, bifurcation, or left main with Rota Ablation. He has done a large volume of complex coronary and valvular interventions. That apart, he is also an expert in cardiac devices like pacemakers, ICDs, and leadless pacemakers.

The foreign trainings that Dr. Kumar received at St. George Hospital, London, and Southampton University Hospital make him one of the best interventional cardiologists and cardiac electrophysiologists of the country. His precision in TAVI procedures or structural heart disease makes him successful.

heading: Frequently Asked Questions
description: Here are some frequently asked questions regarding Dr. Viveka Kumar:

list.name: What procedures does Dr. Kumar specialize in?
list.content: Dr. Kumar specializes in complex cardiac interventions, including angioplasties, TAVI, and electrophysiological procedures.

list.name: How can I schedule an appointment with Dr. Kumar?
list.content: Appointments can be scheduled through the hospital's website or by contacting their office directly.

list.name: Does Dr. Kumar perform minimally invasive procedures?
list.content: Yes, Dr. Kumar is experienced in performing minimally invasive procedures, including TAVI and leadless pacemaker implantation.
